name: Cut The Prize - Rope Machine
description:
Cut The Prize is the most fun rope cutting prize winning arcade game ever!

If you love amusement arcades and prize winning arcade machines then you will love
Cut the Prize!

Spot the prize you want and if press the button and the aim of the cutter is just right the robe will be cut and the prize will be yours, just claw it out the prize door!

There are two different cut the prize machines, collect all the cute stuffed plush toys or up your game and go for the expensive electric gadgets.

Cut The Prize has great simple gameplay with colorful graphics and entertaining sound effects and is great family fun for kids and adults alike.

There is no Limit to the Amount of plays, no coins or credit to buy just play as much as you like.

More games from Glass Frog Games include: Bubble Pop Paint Party, Bonfire Works &Fun Fireworks and Toy Egg Surprise.
